card_faces.name: Flamescroll Celebrant
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Flamescroll Celebrant deals 1 damage to that player.
{1}{R}: Flamescroll Celebrant gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Revel in Silence
card_faces.oracle_text:
You opponents can't cast spells or activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities this turn.
Exile Revel in Silence.

card_faces.name: Selfless Glyphweaver
card_faces.oracle_text: Exile Selfless Glyphweaver: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
card_faces.flavor_text: He offered his light to make sure no others would be dimmed.

card_faces.name: Deadly Vanity
card_faces.oracle_text: Choose a creature or planeswalker, then destroy all other creatures and planeswalkers.

name: Elite Spellbinder
oracle_text:
Flying
When Elite Spellbinder enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.
flavor_text: Paulo Vitor Damo da Rosa, World Champion XXVI

name: Mavinda, Students' Advocate
oracle_text:
Flying
{0}: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell doesn't target a creature you control, it costs {8} more to cast this way. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. Activate only once each turn. (You still pay the spell's costs. Timing rules for the spell still apply.)

name: Strict Proctor
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability to trigger, counter that ability unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: "You might believe that being dead for centuries has made me more lenient. I think you'll find the opposite is true."

name: Sparring Regimen
oracle_text:
When Sparring Regimen enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature and untap it.

name: Retriever Phoenix
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
When Retriever Phoenix enters the battlefield, if you cast it, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
As long as Retriever Phoenix is in your graveyard, if you would learn, you may instead return Retriever Phoenix to the battlefield.

name: Illuminate History
oracle_text: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: "Look at the detail in this stonework! Professor, our assumptions about early Kathorran tool use may not be correct."

name: Gnarled Professor
oracle_text:
Trample
When Gnarled Professor enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: "Class is in season."

name: Basic Conjuration
oracle_text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "I made that! It's mine! Did you see that?"

name: Velomachus Lorehold
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Dramatic Finale
oracle_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor_text: The enraptured audience barely noticed their programs were suddenly blank.

name: Double Major
oracle_text: Copy target creature spell you control, except it isn't legendary if the spell is legendary. (A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)
flavor_text: "Now I can dedicate myself fully to zoetimancy and voice theory!"

name: Elemental Expressionist
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, choose target creature you control. Until end of turn, it gains "If this creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else" and "When you exile this creature, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token."

name: Harness Infinity
oracle_text:
Exchange your hand and graveyard.
Exile Harness Infinity.
flavor_text:
"As I stepped into the star arch, it all became perfectly clear. Life and death are not opposites, but an endless path, twisting around and back upon itself, never ending and never beginning."
—Zhaer, professor of biophilosophy

name: Hofri Ghostforge
oracle_text:
Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to your graveyard."

name: Radiant Scrollwielder
oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

name: Vanishing Verse
oracle_text: Exile target monocolored permanent.
flavor_text: "Whoever summoned that thing had better confess right this moment, or the whole class will be cleaning the ink receptacles for a month."

name: Silverquill Silencer
oracle_text:
As Silverquill Silencer enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell with the chosen name, they lose 3 life and you draw a card.
flavor_text: "I am very much in the mood to start handing out expulsions."

name: Academic Probation
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn.
• Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

name: Devastating Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{W}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{W}{W} cost was paid, an opponent choses up to two nonland permanents they control and returns them to their owner's hand.
Destroy all nonland permanents.

name: Guiding Voice
oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Learn (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and p

name: Semester's End
oracle_text: Exile any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of the next end step, return each of them to the battlefield under its owner's control. Each of them enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.

name: Stonerise Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
{4}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The carved cliffs of Pillardrop thrum with the sounds of ancient spirits rising from the past.

name: Divide by Zero
oracle_text:
Return target spell or permanent with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: "Misery. Inadequacy. Failure. The common denominator is you."

name: Ingenious Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{u} rather tahn pay this spell's mana cost.
If {2}{u} was paid, you draw three cards, then an opponent creates two Treasure tokens and they scry 2. If that cost wasn't paid, you draw X cards.

name: Snow Day
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"Advanced Elemental Manifestations is acnceled until all students have thawed."
—Prismari dormitory notice

name: Vortex Runner
oracle_text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Vortex Runner gets +1/+0 and can't be blcoked.
flavor_text: "By using the vortex, I can study for at least fifteen extra minutes between every class. I wasn't being reckless, Dean Imbraham. I was being efficient."

name: Wormhole Serpent
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: After drownings, devourings, and one highly unpleasant algae infestation, unsupervised portal use on campus was banned.

name: Flunk
oracle_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 7 minus the number of cards in that person's hand.
flavor_text:
"I assure you, no one fails my course more than once."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

name: Oriq Loremage
oracle_text: {T}: Search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. If it's an instant or sorcery card, put a +1/+1 counter on Oriq Loremage.
flavor_text: Nothing can quell the Oriq's thirst for the forbidden secrets of the past.

name: Specter of the Fens
oracle_text:
Flying
{5}{B}: Target oponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Foul specters hunt down those who try to back out of a deal with a daemogoth.

name: Honor Troll
oracle_text:
Vigilance
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Honor Troll gets +2/+1 as long as you have 25 or more life.
flavor_text: First in his clan to attend Strixhaven, and now first in his class.

name: Biblioplex Assistant
oracle_text: When Biblioplex Assistant enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining."
—Isabough of the Biblioplex

name: Culling Ritual
oracle_text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.
flavor_text: "Your own frailty is your undoing. I am merely the one to expose it."

name: Deadly Brew
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If you sacrificed a permanent this way, you may return another permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: No one ever asked what was in Dina's concoctions, so long as they worked.

name: Fracture
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Your defiance is amusing, little mage. It's time you learn how fragile you really are."
—Extus Narr

name: Rip Apart
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Torn from history. Torn from memory. Torn from reality.

name: Rushed Rebirth
oracle_text: Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, search your library for a creature card with lesser mana value, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Witherbloom students learn to see death not as a tragedy, but as opportunity.

name: Venerable Warsinger
oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample
Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

name: The Biblioplex
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it into your graveyard. Activate only if you have exactly zero or seven cards in hand.

name: "Bayou Snapper"
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.

name: "Big Play"
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: "Hungry Tentacles"
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. When that permanent dies this turn, you gain 2 life.

name: "Daemogoth Anguish-Eater"
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
When you sacrifice "Daemogoth Anguish-Eater", each opponent discards a card and you draw a card and gain 2 life.

name: "Blood Sommelier"
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on.

card_faces.name: "Pestilent Cauldron"
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
{1}, {T}: Each opponent mills X cards, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
{4}, {T}: Exile four target cards from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card_faces.name: "Restorative Spell"
card_faces.oracle_text:
Return up to two target creature, land, and/or planeswalker cards from your graveyard to your hand. Each player gains 4 life.
Exile "Restorative Spell".

card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
{1}, {T}: Each opponent mills X cards, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
{4}, {T}: Exile four target cards from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card_faces.name: "Restorative Spell"
card_faces.oracle_text:
Return up to two target creature, land, and/or planeswalker cards from your graveyard to your hand. Each player gains 4 life.
Exile "Restorative Spell".

name: Overgrown Arch
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: You gain 1 life.
{2}, Sacrificie Overgrown Arch: Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Containment Breach
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If its mana value is 2 or less, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor_text: For pest keepers, there's no sound more disheartening than breaking class.
